content.description: Good route with a couple ledges. After the third bolt there are large, detached boulders on the left, but they seem pretty solid. The bolts don't seem to really follow the natural line, but maybe I just went off route.
content.location: Furthest left route on the wall. As you walk up the trail, this and Sex Farm are directly in front of you.

content.description: Probably the best .10d in the canyon. Great rest at the 4th bolt. Crux is getting to the chains. Has a technical start. Mostly a right hand pump. Stemming off the dihedral to the left lowers the route to about a .10a.
content.protection:
7 bolts plus the chains. Shares chains with

Big Bottom

.

content.description: Lower angle climbing than the rest of the wall, this route doesn't see much traffic. After 15 years it's still fairly dirty. The climbing is on sharp holds and more technical than pumpy. There really isn't a distinct crux but it wouldn't be out of the question to fall while looking at the chains

Good climbing on edges and a few crimps. Turning the corner at the second bolt is the first crux. The second is pulling over the bulge to clip the bolts. A v-slot that faces downward provides a good handjam/undercling at the bulge. This route sees almost no traffic.

Fun route with a bouldery crux from the third to the fourth bolt. Big moves, good holds. Above the 4th bolt it gets weird. The holds are hidden and slope in weird angles. Can feel a little desperate going to the chains.
content.protection:
7 bolts + the chains. Shares chains with

Smell the Glove

.
